item.title: CodeSqueeze — Online Code Minifier
item.description: CodeSqueeze is a modern web tool for minifying HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focused on speed, privacy, and a comfortable in-browser workflow.

item.title: Role of the .htaccess file in Apache server configuration
item.description: .htaccess allows you to create your own Apache server management configuration in directories or hosting settings.
